name: Shah Gul
needs:
I'm a student in Loralai Medical College, right now in my 4th year. We have started this campaign to help flood affectees. Our college is off due to persistent rain in Loralai that's why we started the campaign online, for now, once our college will reopen on 28 we'll be collecting donation physically too.

For now we are just taking money as donations, but we have thought to expand it to clothes and other necessities needed by families. The donations are for areas in the winter zone too and Jaffarabad, Naseerabad, Taunsa.
